      • withTransaction

        public static <T> T withTransaction​(java.lang.String dbName,
                                    boolean readOnly,
                                    F.Function0<T> block)
                             throws java.lang.Throwable
        Run a block of code in a JPA transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity class
        Parameters:
        dbName - The persistence unit name
        readOnly - Is the transaction read-only?
        block - Block of code to execute.
        Returns:
        The result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - Thrown in case of error
